ai-tha-ap29:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap29:2.4_0: this gift is the fruit of giving.
ai-tha-ap29:3.2_0: I guided it to the people
ai-tha-ap29:4.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap29:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇa Kassapa.
ai-tha-ap29:6.1_0: The seventh section consisting of two Great Kings
